title: His mother & sister need to travel frequently, its difficult for him to accompany them all the time
transcript: uh she since my father passed away so my mother and my adult younger sister they do not have any available maharam to accompany them whenever they travel to another city however my sister frequently needs to travel for various legitimate purposes and is staying for a few days is time for example she would travel at least five different days in this month inshallah so basically I drop her off return home then travel again to bring her back sometimes my mother also has to travel individually so I accompany her as well but she each round Tre by bus would take around 10 hours on average and I really find it difficult as I have my own work to do and when I will start doing job inshallah normally an office does not permit so much leaves so given this situation what should I do now Allah says Allah does not burden a soul beyond what it can bear you're not obliged to accompany them in what they want unless it is a life and death situation ation they need to go to a hospital they need to have a surgery going for work going for Ledger going for visitation no you're not obliged to accompany them when there is a huge risk and hardship on you and Allah knows best but you try your level best to uh um compromise and reconcile to the best of your ability
